nodes.text: Star Wars 10 is the tenth issue of the canon comic series Star Wars. The comic was written by Charles Soule, illustrated by Jan Bazaldua, and published by Marvel Comics on January 6, 2021.
"OPERATION STARLIGHT, PART 2 (OF 3)" – REELING FROM THE LOSS OF ONE OF THEIR OWN, THE REBELS FINALLY SEE A PATH FORWARD!
In one panel, Kes Dameron refers to Leia Organa as commander rather than her correct rank of general.
